title: In case of tenanted properties to be redeveloped under Reg
clause_text: In case of tenanted properties to be redeveloped under Reg. No. 33(7), certificate from MHADA/Land owning public authority, certifying that at least51% of the certified and eligible tenants of the property/each building have granted irrevocable consent for development in favour of owner/developer & in case of tenanted properties to be redeveloped under Reg. No. 33(9) certificate from MHADA/Land owning public authority, certifying that at least 51% of the certified and eligible tenants of the property/each building or overall 60% eligible tenants have granted irrevocable consent for development in favour of owner/developer.
